# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.6.0] - 2025-11-01

### Initial Release

This is the first public release of ComoPy.

#### Added
- Hardware generation framework with Python-based HDL
- Native Python static scheduling and event-driven simulators
- CIRCT backend for SystemVerilog generation
- Verilator integration for simulation
- Example design: DarkRISCV processor implementation

[0.6.0]: https://github.com/mprcpku/comopy/releases/tag/v0.6.0
